list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sweet or savory dish made as a smooth light mass with whipped cream and beaten egg white, flavored with chocolate, fish, etc., and typically served chilled.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: The Brut Réserve sở hữu một mousse kem tuyệt vời của bong bóng nhỏ gọn, nhỏ gọn

a brown frothy emulsion of oil and seawater formed by weathering of an oil slick.
